name: Mission Neighborhood Centers
description: Mission Neighborhood Centers serves over 45,000 low-income seniors, youth and families with young children at 13 sites throughout San Francisco. With a legacy dating back over 100 years, their guiding principles remain the same: empowerment, cultural affirmation and personal responsibility. They provide a continuum of educational programs and social services to the community populations most in need. MNC is a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization. MNC delivers culturally sensitive, multi-generatio
